article_title: Home health aide accused of using client's credit card
article_text:
A 66-year-old woman is the victim of credit card theft.

Police said the person behind it was supposed to be taking care of her.

Investigators said Damyka Jewell admitted to using the victim's credit card number at several locations.

The 26-year-old was brought in to help the woman who was bedridden from a stroke.
